text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has been updated: https://t.co/a0y3StFiss

On Fri 2 April 2021, 3,402 new cases and 52 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the UK

31,301,267 people have received the first dose of a #vaccine and 4,948,635 have received a 2nd dose https://t.co/GMB5c0w8MM
